resource.chars:
15 Harley Street 
May 14/56
My dear Sir 
I am most strongly of 
opinion that it would be 
inexpedient to publish 
Mr Raineys paper in the 
Phil. Transactions. A 
very copious abstract in 
fact almost the entire paper 
is given in the Proceedings 
Vol vii & this will I am 
sure fully meet all the 
deserts of the communication.
The paper seems to me to 
be
